src:
Sidang Praperadilan Nyoman Dhamantra, KPK Bawa Bukti 1 Koper
06 Nov 2019, 14:29 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - Sidang praperadilan tersangka kasus dugaan suap impor bawang putih I Nyoman Dhamantra kembali digelar dengan agenda pembuktian. KPK membawa sebanyak 111 bukti surat atau dokumen di dalam satu koper.
"Ada 111 bukti ya dari bukti dokumen bukti elektronik. Bukti CD, bukti screenshoot dari WhatsApp," kata anggota tim biro hukum KPK, Firman, di PN Jaksel, Jl Ampera Raya, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Firman mengatakan bukti-bukti surat tersebut antara lain bukti di tingkat penyelidikan, penyidikan, dan bukti elektronik. Selain itu KPK juga membawa beberapa putusan perkara praperadilan kasus lain.
Serta ada bukti screenshoot komunikasi pemohon dengan orang lain. Firman menyebut bukti chat WhatsApp itu digunakan untuk membuktikan kronologis tertangkap tangannya Dhamantra saat dibawa ke KPK.
"Beberapa screenshoot chat aplikasi WhatsApp untuk membuktikan kronologis tertangkap tangannya pemohon pada saat dibawa ke kantor oleh penyelidik kami ke KPK," kata Firman.


Selain dokumen satu koper, KPK akan melengkapi bukti kasus suap impor bawang putih besok (Yulida Medistiara/detikcom)
text:
Nyoman Dhamantra Pretrial Court, KPK Bring Evidence 1 Suitcase
Nov 6 2019, 14:29 by Yulida Medistiara
Jakarta - The pretrial hearing of the suspected bribery import case I Nyoman Dhamantra was held again with an evidentiary agenda. The KPK carried 111 proof of letters or documents in one suitcase.
"There are 111 proofs of electronic evidence documents. Evidence of CDs, evidence of screenshoots from WhatsApp," said a member of the KPK law firm, Firman, at South Jakarta District Court, Jl Ampera Raya, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Firman said the letter's evidence included evidence at the investigation, investigation and electronic evidence level. In addition, the KPK also brought a number of pretrial cases to other cases.
And there is evidence of a screenshot of the applicant's communication with others. Firman said that WhatsApp chat evidence was used to prove the chronology of Dhamantra being caught when brought to the KPK.
"Some WhatsApp application chat screenshoots to prove the chronology of the applicant being caught when brought to the office by our investigators to the KPK," Firman said.


In addition to the one-suitcase document, the KPK will complete evidence of a bribery import case of garlic tomorrow (Yulida Medistiara / detikcom)
